meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched sound, as a bird or the wind.
meanings.sent1: The little bird tweeted happily in the tree.
meanings.sent2: The wind tweeted through the branches of the trees.
meanings.sent3: The bird tweeted a cheerful tune to its feathered friends.
meanings.sent4: The wind tweeted a haunting melody as it passed by.
meanings.sent5: The tweet of the bird filled the air with joy.

meanings.definition: To express a high-pitched sound, as a bird or the wind.
meanings.sent1: She tweeted a song that echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The children tweeted with excitement when they saw the rainbow.
meanings.sent3: The wind tweeted a secret message to the leaves on the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tweeted like a chorus of birds in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The tweet of the wind carried tales of distant lands.

meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched sound, as a bird or the wind.
meanings.sent1: The robin tweeted a greeting to the rising sun.
meanings.sent2: The wind tweeted softly as it danced through the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The bird tweeted a lullaby to the sleepy forest creatures.
meanings.sent4: The wind tweeted a promise of change in the air.
meanings.sent5: The tweet of the bird signaled the start of a new day.
